Reviews.Title: a solid phone
Reviews.Author: Gene C.
Reviews.Content: The V3xx was a great improvement over the prior version, despite its age this phone does what i need it to do and more.

Reviews.Title: GREAT QUALITY - CERTAINLY AN UPGRADED VERSION FROM THE RESPECTED V3 RAZR.
Reviews.Author: Phone Reviewer "Cell Phone Reviewer"
Reviews.Content: GREAT QUALITY - CERTAINLY AN UPGRADED VERSION OF THE RESPECTED V3 RAZR.- 3G CONNECTIVITY- DUAL CAMERA'S - GREAT QUALITY PICTURES- MICRO SD MEMORY CARD SLOT - FOR ADDED STORAGE - YOU CAN PLAY YOUR FAVORITE MP3/VIDEO ON IT AS WELL AS STORE PICTURES- BEAUTIFUL SLICK CLASSIC DESIGN  OF THE MOTOROLA RAZR.- MADE FROM STURDY MATERIAL - BUILT TO LAST. HAD IT FOR 12 MONTHS - HAD THE USUAL BEAT-UPS OF MY CHILDERN - NO PROBLEMS.

Reviews.Title: This is amazing! (read plz)
Reviews.Author: Nice Guy
Reviews.Content: Having this phone brings back so many memories. Ordered the phone with my wife saying to myself. "What's the use for having a smartphone in your face or having computer in your pocket to notify you every single time there's some drama going on with other ppl you havent seen in so many years. Well life gets all of us. So open yours eyes and pick your head up. Value the life that shines around you, and remember what you have around you." So I was stoked to get this phone. And thinking I had to wait 7 days was to long. Lol but thankfully came in 3. So I would definitely recommend to order from here. Phone came in superb condition. So hats off. And to who all have read through. Love life, and enjoy the beauty in this new day. :)

Reviews.Title: 2 Thumbs up
Reviews.Author: Patrick Mcglynn
Reviews.Content: This is the 3rd razr I've ordered off of amazon and by far the best. It's the latest model, great price, it came very fast, and this is the first time I've boughten one of these and it came in a Motorola box sealed, never ever opened,, Brand new,, even had that new phone smell to it....lol..but seriously, great seller,,I know where to go the next time I need a phone.

Reviews.Title: Battery
Reviews.Author: RICHARD T. FELO
Reviews.Content: THE  battery only last about 6 hrs,The battery should last longer than 6 hours for the price of the phone.

Reviews.Title: A Classic phone
Reviews.Author: M007
Reviews.Content: This Phone was as described New  and the service was excellent and fast.. I was looking for this phone and Im glad I found it.. Lets get something clear, this is not a smartphone so if your looking for one they have them available, just make sure you read the technical details and product details that they provide you with..

Reviews.Title: Horrible will not recommend it for anyone.!!
Reviews.Author: Yan21
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my dad who is a 57 year old man and as you can imagine he doesn't like smartphones. He has been in love with this phone since it first came out to the market. This version says to be the international version saw I  bought because he lives in Honduras. H e says the first 2 weeks worked just fine but after that the phone would turn off, people would call him and the phone wouldnt ring not even a notification and on top of all of that the signal was not good.

Reviews.Title: Steve E
Reviews.Author: Miguel Sebastian Elcano
Reviews.Content: Disappointed. Phone randomly shut itself off. Great features when it worked. Returned RAZR V3XX and exchanged for another Motorola phone.30 Days and I still don't have a phone. Poor turn around time.

Reviews.Title: Get what you asked for!
Reviews.Author: Denise Howard
Reviews.Content: It is what it is, it is outdated.  But that is the phone that the person chose.  Now back with an I Phone 5CAs for the phone itself it was in its prime about 7 years ago.  Not a bad product just dated.  Think they learned a lesson and will keep up with technologically.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Ahuber5
Reviews.Content: I think flip phone technology peaked right around the V3, it's been downhill from there.  This is a great, basic phone for prepaid use.  Simple and cheap. Not the most durable, but they weren't designed to be used as hackysacks.

Reviews.Title: It works but I need a smart phone
Reviews.Author: B.Bull
Reviews.Content: Product was as described, delivered promptly, and in good condition.  It didn't take me very long to realize that although I thought I wanted a non-smart phone, I changed my mind after struggling with text messages for 3 days.  Still going to keep the phone for use when traveling abroad (since it's unlocked), but opted to go ahead and get a smart phone.  They are simply so much easier to use, virtually the same size, and have infinitely more capabilities.

Reviews.Title: no good 4 me
Reviews.Author: R. Jalal
Reviews.Content: i have t-mobile & ordered this phone (i live in northern california) & when i made phone calls, i heard a lot of back ground static. don't know if the phone was defective or what, but it was no good for me. i returned it.

Reviews.Title: Lot of issues , freezes every time I want to use it
Reviews.Author: fay
Reviews.Content: Notvrecomendedvat all , was rocking fine on first 3days , then one how , keyboard doesn't respond, I wish I didn't spend money on this piece of crap , sorry for this word but I want a refund

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
U.S. tri-band GSM cell phone compatible with  850/1800/1900 frequencies and US 3G compatibility via 850/1900 UMTS/HSDPA plus GPRS/EDGE capabilities
1.3-megapixel digital camera with 8x digital zoom; digital audio/video player
Bluetooth stereo music; MicroSD memory expansion; organizer; speaker-independent voice controls
Up to 3 hours of talk time, up to 290 hours (12+ days) of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola RAZR V3xx Unlocked Phone with 3G, MP3/Video Player, and MicroSD Slot--International Version with No Warranty (Licorice Black)
